text: Autun is a commune and subprefecture in the Saône-et-Loire department in the Bourgogne-Franche-Comté region of central-eastern France. == Transport == === Road === The D681, D978, D980, D107, D973, D120, D256, D46 and D287 roads pass through the Autun commune. === Rail === Autun has a main station, Autun Railway Station, or Gare d'Autun in French. == Twinned cities == Autun is twinned with Ingelheim am Rhein in Germany, Kawagoe in Japan, Arévalo in Spain and Stevenage in the United Kingdom. == References == Category:Communes in Saône-et-Loire Category:Subprefectures in France
title: Autun
